scenario.name: Sipwise NGCP Benchmark UAC Caller
scenario.send: SUBSCRIBE sip:[field0 file="caller.csv" line=0]@[field2 file="caller.csv" line=0] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:[field0 file="caller.csv" line=0]@[field2 file="caller.csv" line=0]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: <sip:[field0 file="caller.csv" line=0]@[field2 file="caller.csv" line=0]> Call-ID: NGCP%[field4 file="callee.csv" line=0]%///[call_id] CSeq: 1 SUBSCRIBE Contact: <sip:[field0 file="caller.csv" line=0]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Allow: INVITE,ACK,CANCEL,BYE,PRACK,INFO,UPDATE,OPTIONS,MESSAGE,NOTIFY,REFER Max-Forwards: 70 Expires: 10 Event: call-info Content-Length: [len]

ACK sip:[field0 file="caller.csv" line=0]@[field3 file="caller.csv" line=0] SIP/2.0 [last_Via:] From: <sip:[field0 file="caller.csv" line=0]@[field2 file="caller.csv" line=0]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: <sip:[field0 file="caller.csv" line=0]@[field3 file="caller.csv" line=0]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: NGCP%[field4 file="caller.csv" line=0]%///[call_id] CSeq: 1 ACK Contact: <sip:[field0 file="caller.csv" line=0]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: [len]

SUBSCRIBE sip:[field0 file="caller.csv" line=0]@[field2 file="caller.csv" line=0] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:[field0 file="caller.csv" line=0]@[field2 file="caller.csv" line=0]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: <sip:[field0 file="caller.csv" line=0]@[field2 file="caller.csv" line=0]> [field1 file="caller.csv" line=0] Call-ID: NGCP%[field4 file="callee.csv" line=0]%///[call_id] CSeq: 2 SUBSCRIBE Contact: <sip:[field0 file="caller.csv" line=0]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Allow: INVITE,ACK,CANCEL,BYE,PRACK,INFO,UPDATE,OPTIONS,MESSAGE,NOTIFY,REFER Max-Forwards: 70 Expires: 10 Event: call-info Content-Length: [len]
